analysis.description:
DRSCoin.proposeGame (/unique_chucks/10/0x6b249a94182219cb1af58a197573dccd9ab94144.sol#711-720) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(proposedGames[gameAddress] == 0,game already in proposed list)
month in TimeUtils.parseTimestampToYM (/unique_chucks/10/0x6b249a94182219cb1af58a197573dccd9ab94144.sol#235) is a local variable never initialiazed
